scripts.dev: cd react && BROWSER=none npm run start & ./node_modules/.bin/electron electron
scripts.build: rm -rf tmp && cd ./electron && npm install --only=production && cd .. && cp -r ./electron ./tmp && cd ./react && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r react/build tmp && cd tmp && mv -f index.prod.js index.js && ../node_modules/.bin/electron-builder
